title.rendered: Actor Vidyut Jammwal spends a fun filled day with children form Mission Education centre

content.rendered:
Actor Vidyut Jammwal spent a fun filled day with Smile Foundation children at one of the Mission Education centers in Mumbai on March 27, 2019. The actor spent quality time with the kids and was moved by the love and gratitude shown by the children at the center. It was fun-filled day for the little ones. The actor also talked to the children about the importance of education and hard work and how important was it for them to chase their dreams. The day ended with much fun for the kids as well as the actor.

Mission Education is a national level programme of Smile Foundation, which is committed to providing basic education and healthcare to underprivileged children.

Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 750,000 children and their families every year, through more than 350 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 1000 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
